meta_desc: Apartment Onyx — modern duplex with private pool, terrace with garden and sea view, barbecue, fully equipped kitchen, air conditioning in all rooms, and private parking in Lovran near Opatija.
onyx_intro: Modern duplex with private pool, terrace, garden, and sea view.
desc_p1: Apartment Onyx combines contemporary design with comfort, just steps from the Adriatic coast. Ideal for 2–4 guests, it features elegant interiors, abundant light, and easy access to the highlights of the Opatija Riviera.
desc_p2: Perfect for couples, families, or business travelers, Onyx provides a relaxing yet stylish atmosphere for your stay.
